DOC.brief_title: Personalized Computerized Inhibitory Control Training OCD
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate effectiveness computerized training program ( call Personalized Computerized Inhibitory Training , PCIT ) couple cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) consist Exposures Response Prevention treat obsessive compulsive disorder ( OCD ) patient previously underwent CBT , still residual symptom .
DOC.criteria: Principal diagnosis OCD ( assessed SCID ) . Clinically significant OCD symptom ( YBOCS score least 16 ) . Have history complete trial least 1 EX/RP session . Have access computer laptop . Individuals follow disorder exclude : bipolar , psychosis , current major depressive disorder ( assessed SCID ) . Patients head injury loss consciousness five minute neurological condition affect central nervous system . Patients take psychiatric medication ask maintain stable dose 6 week prior study entry . Vision hear loss ( although individual vision correct glass contact exclude ) . Active suicidality warrant immediate clinical care .
